summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Bar Manager app with rustic design. All navigation, product sales, keypad functionality, and UI elements work correctly. Minor data persistence issue identified.

integration_issues.issue: Transactions are processed but not appearing in history view or updating statistics

design_issues.issue: Card felt styling (.card-felt) not found in some contexts

passed_tests: Navigation between all 4 views (Vendita, Spese, Statistiche, Storico)
Fixed price product sales with immediate registration and feedback
Custom price products open numeric keypad correctly
Numeric keypad full functionality (input, backspace, clear, cancel, confirm)
Rustic design implementation (wood header, green felt background)
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
Keypad edge cases (multiple comma prevention, backspace functionality)
action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate localStorage data persistence issue - transactions are being processed but not persisting or displaying in history/statistics views
